Title: #70 5 Simple Ways to Improve Physical Education w/ Edtech
Description: Jarrod Robinson, the PE Geek, helps us learn how to use technology in physical education. Lots of fun ideas! Show notes will be available at www.coolcatteacher.com/e70  approximately 5 hours after the episode goes live! See all of the shows at www.coolcatteacher.com/podcast .
